metadata.title: Urupapuro rw'itangiriro
metadata.summary: BBC Gahuza itanga amakuru yizewe yo kw’isi hamwe no mu karere

headlines.headline: Sudani 'yaburijemo igerageza ryo guhirika ubutegetsi'

items.summary: Jenerali Jamal Omar yatangaje ko abantu barenga icumi batawe muri yombi, bakaba barimo abakiri ku kazi muri iki gihe n'abari mu kihuruko cy'izabukuru bo mu gisirikare no mu rwego rw'igihugu rw'iperereza.

indexImage.altText: Jenerali Jamal Omar, umuvugizi w'inama ya gisirikare, yabitangarje kuri televiziyo y'igihugu
indexImage.caption: Jenerali Jamal Omar, umuvugizi w'inama ya gisirikare, yabitangarje kuri televiziyo y'igihugu

headlines.headline: Igisirikare n’abatavuga rumwe muri Sudani bashitse ku masezerano

relatedItems.summary: Abahuza mu ndyane zo mu gihugu ca Sudani bamenyesha ko abategetsi ba gisirikare hamwe n'abatavuga rumwe muri ico gihugu bashitse ku masezerano y'ugusangira ubutegtsi gushika habaye amatora.

headlines.headline: Internet muri Sudani yuguruwe 'ariko ku mushingwamanza gusa'

relatedItems.summary: Umushingwamanza muri Sudani, Abdel-Adheem Hassan, yabwiye BBC ko umuhora wa internet wasubiye gukora inyuma y'indwi yose wugawe - ariko kuri wenyene gusa.

headlines.headline: 'U Rwanda ni igihugu cy’ubwisanzure' - Sezibera

items.summary: Mu kiganiro na BBC, Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga w'u Rwanda yavuze ko yemera ubwisanzure bw'itangazamakuru n'akamaro mu iterambere ry'ibihugu k'itangazamakuru rinenga ibitagenda.

indexImage.altText: Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga w'u Rwanda Richard Sezibera
indexImage.caption: Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga w'u Rwanda Richard Sezibera

headlines.headline: Gufungwa imyaka 2 usebeje umuyobozi mu Rwanda mu kumushushanya

relatedItems.summary: Mu Rwanda abanyamakuru baravuga ko batishimiye amwe mu mategeko mashya ahana ibyaha yatangiye gukurikizwa nyuma yo gusohoka muri igazeti ya leta

headlines.headline: Indege iri mu kirere yicundugutuye abantu 37 barakomereka

items.summary: Air Canada ivuga ko indege yo mu bwoko bwa Boeing 77 -200 "yahuye n'imiyaga ikomeye ikayihungabanya ubwo yari imaze amasaha abiri irenze ikirere cya Hawaii".

indexImage.altText: Abakozi bo mu ndege bafasha abagenzi mu gihe iyi ndege yari ihise ijya kugwa Hawaii kubera iki kibazo
indexImage.caption: Abakozi bo mu ndege bafasha abagenzi mu gihe iyi ndege yari ihise ijya kugwa Hawaii kubera iki kibazo

headlines.headline: Indege muri Myanmar yatuye ata mapine y’imbere

relatedItems.summary: Izuru ry'iyo ndege y'ikompanyi Myanmar National Airlines ryarasereretse ku kibuga c'indege c'ahitwa Mandalay imbere y'uko ihagarara.

headlines.headline: R. Kelly yongeye gutabwa muri yombi

items.summary: Umuhanzi R. Kelly ubu arafunze, yafatiwe i Chicago ku birego byo gutwara abantu hagamijwe kubakoresha imibonano mpuzabitsina, nkuko amakuru ava muri Amerika abivuga

indexImage.altText: R. Kelly

headlines.headline: R Kelly yarekuwe arishe imfashanyo yo kurera abana

relatedItems.summary: Ibiro vy'umucamanza wo mu gace ka Cook vyatangaje ko ejo ku wa gatandatu mu gatondo ariho R Kelly yariha ayo mahera yari yasabwe aca ararekurwa haciye akanya gato.

headlines.headline: Impunzi z’Abarundi muri Tanzania 'zishobora gutahukanwa ku nguvu'

items.summary: Impunzi z'abarundi ziri muri Tanzaniya zivuga ko zifise impungenge ku mugambi w'ico gihugu wo kuzihungura ku nguvu, mu gihe zitizeye umutekano mu gihe zosubizwa mu Burundi.

indexImage.altText: Zimwe mu mpunzi z'Abarundi ziri muri Tanzania
indexImage.caption: Zimwe mu mpunzi z'Abarundi ziri muri Tanzania

headlines.headline: Interbank Burundi yagirizwa "guha" imigwi irwana $1.500.000

items.summary: Ubushikirizamanza bw'Uburundi buragiriza ibanki Interbank Burundi yo muri ico gihugu ko yoba ifasha mu buryo bw'amafaranga imirwi ihungabanya umutekano w'igihugu.

indexImage.altText: Ibiro vya Interbank Burundi

headlines.headline: Mzee Mukwano nyiri Mukwano Group of Companies yapfuye

items.summary: Mzee Mukwano, ni se wa Alykhan Karmali umugabo ubu uyoboye ibikorwa by'ubushabitsi by'umuryango wa Mukwano birimo ubwubatsi, amabanki, ubwikorezi n'inganda.

indexImage.altText: Mzee Mukwano
indexImage.caption: Mzee Mukwano

headlines.headline: Perezida Magufuli yasabye abagore 'kwirekura bakabyara abana benshi'

items.summary: Si ubwa mbere Bwana Magufuli ashishikarije abagore kurushaho kubyara abana benshi, ubuheruka hakaba hari mu kwezi kwa cyenda k'umwaka ushize.

headlines.headline: Abacyekwaho gucuruza i Burayi abakobwa ba Nigeria bafashwe

headlines.headline: Ibitekerezo ku biganiro bitatu biherutse

items.summary: Turavugana n'abatanze ibitekerezo ku biganiro bitatu biherutse ku bwisanzure bw'itangazamakuru mu Rwanda no mu Burundi, ku nyito y'ubwoko mu Rwanda no ku mirwano i Minembwe.

media.title: Ibitekerezo ku biganiro bitatu biherutse

synopses.short: Imvo n'Imvano ku bitekerezo ku biganiro bitatu biherutse: itangazamakuru, amoko, Minembwe
synopses.long: Turavugana n'abatanze ibitekerezo ku biganiro bitatu biherutse ku bwisanzure bw'itangazamakuru mu Rwanda no mu Burundi, ku nyito y'ubwoko mu Rwanda no ku mirwano i Minembwe muri Kongo.
synopses.medium: Turavugana n'abatanze ibitekerezo ku biganiro bitatu biherutse ku bwisanzure bw'itangazamakuru mu Rwanda no mu Burundi, ku nyito y'ubwoko mu Rwanda no ku mirwano i Minembwe.

headlines.headline: Ivyiyumviro vy'abatwandikiye ku ntambara iriko ibera i Minembwe muri RDC: igice ca 2

items.summary: Imvo n'Imvano ku vyiyumviro vy'abatwandikiye ku kiganiro ku ntambara ya Minembwe muri RDC.

media.title: Ivyiyumviro vy'abatwandikiye ku kiganiro ku ntambara iriko ibera i Minembwe muri RDC

synopses.short: Imvo n'Imvano ku vyiyumviro vy'abatwandikiye ku kiganiro ku ntambara ya Minembwe muri RDC
synopses.long: Iki ni igice ca kabiri c'ikiganiro giha umwanya abatwandikiye batanga ivyiyumviro ku ntambara zibera i MInembwe muri Republika y'Intwaro Rusangi ya Kongo, aho abatumire bacu, Gad Mukiza Nzabinesha, umuyobozi w'akarere ka Minembwe kari mu ntara ya Kivu y'ubumanuko muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Kongo,  na Pierrot Kaluba umuyobozi w'abanyendu, bishura ku bibazo mwatwandikiye.

media.caption: Imvo n'Imvano ku vyiyumviro vy'abatwandikiye ku kiganiro ku ntambara ya Minembwe muri RDC

headlines.headline: Impari hagati ya Faustin Twagiramungu na André Sebatware yari umutegetsi kuri Grégoire Kayibanda

items.summary: Impari hagati ya André Sebatware yabaye umutegetsi kuri Grégoire Kayibanda na Faustin Twagiramungu yabaye umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Rwanda inyuma y'ihonyabwoko ryo mu Rwanda.

media.title: Imvo n'imvano yo ku wa 15 z'ukwa gatandatu 2019

synopses.short: Andrea Sebatware na  Faustin Twagiramungu baraharira ku vyo Twagiramungu yamuvuzeko
synopses.long: Muri kino kiganiro, Andrea Sebatware yabaye umutegetsi kuri Gregoire Kayibanda  na  Faustin Twagiramungu yabaye umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Rwanda inyuma y'ihonyabwoko ryo mu Rwanda, baharira ku mvururu zabaye mu cyo yise amarembere ya republika ya mbere yari irongowe na Gregoire Kayibanda
synopses.medium: Impari hagati ya Andrea Sebatware yabaye umutegetsi kuri Gregoire Kayibanda  na  Faustin Twagiramungu yabaye umushikiranganji wa mbere w'u Rwanda inyuma y'ihonyabwoko ryo mu Rwanda

media.caption: Andrea Sebatware na Faustin Twagiramungu baraharira ku vyo Twagiramungu yamuvuzeko

indexImage.altText: Twagiramungu (i bubamfu) Sebatware (i buryo)
indexImage.caption: Twagiramungu (i bubamfu) Sebatware (i buryo)

headlines.headline: Ikiganiro ku mirwano i Minembwe muri Kongo

items.summary: Ni ikiganiro ku mirwano imaze iminsi ibera mu karere ka Minembwe muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Kongo, hagati y'amoko y'abanyamulenge, ababembe, abafureru n'abanyendu.

media.title: Ikiganiro ku mirwano i Minembwe muri Kongo

synopses.short: Imvo n'Imvano ku mirwano i Minembwe muri Kongo
synopses.long:
Imvo n'Imvano irajya mu karere ka Minembwe kari mu ntara ya Kivu y'amajyepfo muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo, hamaze iminsi habera imirwano hagati y'amoko y'abanyamulenge, ababembe, abafureru n'abanyendu. 

Abatumire bacu ni Gad Mukiza, umuyobozi w'akarere ka Minimbwe, Kaluba Pierrot, umuyobozi w'ubwoko bw'abanyendu, na Nyamuhombeza Ombe, umunyecongo uri muri Finland ukomoka i Bukavu mu ntara ya Kivu y'amajyepfo akaba akurikirana ibibera mu gihugu cye.
Turikumwe kandi na Jean Paul Turayishimye, umuvugizi w'ihuriro nyarwanda RNC.
synopses.medium: Ni ikiganiro ku mirwano imaze iminsi ibera mu karere ka Minembwe muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Kongo, hagati y'amoko y'abanyamulenge, ababembe, abafureru n'abanyendu.

media.caption: Imvo n'Imvano ku mirwano i Minembwe muri Kongo

indexImage.altText: Umusikare wa Kongo ucunze umutekno i Beni

headlines.headline: Ihohotera rishingiye gu gitsina mu buyobozi bwa Afghanistan

items.summary: Hejuru mu butegetsi bwa Afghanistan haravugwa ibyaha by'ihohotera rishingiye ku gitsina no guhatira abagore gusambana. Itohozamakuru rya BBC ryaganiriye n'ababikorewe bavuga ko byabaye nk'umuco, ariko abategetsi baho bahakana ibi bikorwa

headlines.headline: Abana basakuza bo mu Buholandi babujijwe gukinira ku kibuga cy'ishuri

items.summary: Abatuye aho iryo shuri riherereye binubiye ko iyo abo bana bari gukina, basakuza bakarenza ikigero cy'urusaku ntarengwa cya desibeli (decibel) 70 mu bice bituwemo n'abantu.

headlines.headline: Abapfasoni 100 ba BBC 2018: Ni nde ari ku rutonde?

headlines.headline: Perezida wa Madagascar ati: 'Tuzagaruka dukomeye kurushaho'

items.summary: Bwana Rajoelina wari muri sitade ya Cairo ubwo ikipe yatsindwaga na Tunisia, umukino urangiye yanditse kuri Twitter ko uku gutsindwa kubabaje.

indexImage.altText: Perezida Rajoelina
indexImage.caption: Perezida Rajoelina yari yaje gushyigikira ikipe y'igihugu cye i Cairo

headlines.headline: Koscielny yanze kujyana na Arsenal muri Amerika

items.summary: Amakuru avuga ko ikipe ya Bordeaux yemereye Koscielny kumuha kontaro y'imyaka itatu.

indexImage.altText: Koscielny amaze gukinira Arsenal imikino 353 ndetse yayifashije kwegukana igikombe cya FA mu mwaka w'imikino wa 2013-2014 no mu wa 2014-2015
indexImage.caption: Koscielny amaze gukinira Arsenal imikino 353 ndetse yayifashije kwegukana igikombe cya FA mu mwaka w'imikino wa 2013-2014 no mu wa 2014-2015

headlines.headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w’amaguru kuri uyu wa 11.07.2019

items.summary: Umurwi Fenerbahce uvuga ko ata bushobozi ufise bwo kugura umukinyi wo hagati Mezut Ozil wa Arsenal.

indexImage.altText: Mezut Ozil

headlines.headline: Madagascar irakomeza inzozi zayo?

items.summary: Madagascar yazamutse mu itsinda B ari iya mbere kandi ari ubwa mbere igiye muri iri rushanwa, igeze muri 1/16 isezerera Kongo Kinshasa ikomeza gutungurana.

indexImage.altText: Ikipe ya Madagascar
indexImage.caption: Ikipe ya Madagascar mu byishimo ubwo yari imaze gutsinda Kongo kuri za penaliti

headlines.headline: Umukino wa mbere wa Lampard atoza Chelsea byagenze bite?

items.summary: Rutahizamu Michy Batshuayi ku munota wa munani yatsindiye igitego Chelsea, asonga ishoti rya mugenzi we Robert Kenedy Nascimento ryari rigaruwe n'umunyezamu.

indexImage.altText: Lampard
indexImage.caption: Frank Lampard ari gutoza ikipe afitemo umuhigo w'ibitego byinshi

headlines.headline: Visi perezida wa FFB 'afungiwe' amafaranga y'abakinnyi

items.summary: Umuyobozi wungirije w’ishyirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Burundi biravugwa ko afunze mu gihe hakorwa iperereza ku ibura ry’amafaranga y’agahimbazamusyi k’ikipe y’Intamba mu Rugamba ubwo yari muri CAN.

indexImage.altText: Abakinnyi b'Intamba mu Rugamba mu gikombe cya Afrika 2019 mu Misiri
indexImage.caption: Abakinnyi b'Intamba mu Rugamba ngo nta gahimbazamusyi babonye mu Misiri kuko kibwe

headlines.headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru i Bulaya ku 09.07.2019

items.summary: Atletico Madrid yatanguye umugambi w'uguhana umusatirizi w'umufaransa, Antoine Griezmann w'imyaka 28 yitezwe kwimukira muri Barcelona.

indexImage.altText: Leroy Sane

headlines.headline: Neymar yabuze ku myitozo ya mbere ya PSG

items.summary: Hari amakuru avuga ko uyu musore yaba ashaka gusubira mu ikipe ya FC Barcelona.

indexImage.altText: Neymar Junior umukinnyi uhenze kurusha abandi ku isi biravugwa ko ashaka gusubira muri Barca
indexImage.caption: Neymar Junior umukinnyi uhenze kurusha abandi ku isi biravugwa ko ashaka gusubira muri Barca

headlines.headline: CAN2019: Inka 'zanesheje' ibisamagwe

items.summary: Madagascar yanganyije n'ibisamagwe bya Kongo 2 - 2 bakizwa na za penaliti aho Kongo yatsinze ebyiri naho Madagascar igatsinda enye.

indexImage.altText: Madagascar ni iya 190 ku rutonde rwa FIFA iri mu makipe yahabwaga amahirwe macye cyane muri iri rushanwa
indexImage.caption: Madagascar ni iya 190 ku rutonde rwa FIFA iri mu makipe yahabwaga amahirwe macye cyane muri iri rushanwa

headlines.headline: USA yaciye umuhigo yegukana igikombe cy’isi cya 4

items.summary: Abanyamerikakazi berekanye ubuhanga bwabo mu kibuga ariko no hanze yacyo bakomeza kuba ku isonga ry'amakuru.

indexImage.altText: Amerika yegukanye igikombe cya kane, ikipe iyigwa mu ntege yegukanye bibiri
indexImage.caption: Amerika yegukanye igikombe cya kane, ikipe iyigwa mu ntege yegukanye bibiri

headlines.headline: Messi yeretswe ikarita itukura bwa mbere mu myaka 14

items.summary: Messi, utarigera yerekwa ikarita itukura muri Barcelone kugeza ubu, ikarita imwe gusa itukura yari yareretswe mbere yaho yari iyo mu myaka 14 ishize ubwo yatangiraga gukinira Argentine.

indexImage.altText: Lionel Messi na Gary Medel beretswe ikariata itukura ku munota wa 37 w'umukino bahita basohorwa mu kibuga
indexImage.caption: Lionel Messi na Gary Medel beretswe ikariata itukura ku munota wa 37 w'umukino bahita basohorwa mu kibuga

headlines.headline: Cameroun ifite igikombe giheruka yasezerewe, Afurika y'Epfo itungura Misiri

items.summary: Ibitego bya Stephane Bahoken na Clinton Njie byafashije Cameroun kurangiza igice cya mbere iri imbere ku bitego 2-1, nubwo Nigeria ari yo yari yafunguye amazamu ibifashijwemo na Odion Ighalo.

indexImage.altText: Nigeria imaze gutwara igikombe cy'Afurika cy'ibihugu inshuro eshatu, igiheruka ikaba yaracyegukanye mu mwaka wa 2013
indexImage.caption: Nigeria imaze gutwara igikombe cy'Afurika cy'ibihugu inshuro eshatu, igiheruka ikaba yaracyegukanye mu mwaka wa 2013

headlines.headline: Atletico Madrid irashinja Barça 'agasuzuguro'

items.summary: Mu itangazo Atletico yasohoye ku munsi w'ejo ku wa gatanu, yavuze ko "ibabajwe cyane n'imyitwarire ya bombi [Griezmann na Barcelone], cyane cyane Barcelone".

indexImage.altText: Antoine Griezmann

headlines.headline: Uhagarariye Pogba avuga ko ashaka kuva muri Manchester United

items.summary: Mu kwezi gushize kwa gatandatu, Pogba yavuze ko "ubu gishobora kuba ari cyo gihe cyiza cyo kureba agashya ahandi".

indexImage.altText: Paul Pogba

headlines.headline: Ayavugwa mu mupira w'amaguru 05.07.2019

items.summary: Umukinyi Bruno Fernandes aritezwe muri Manchester United.

indexImage.altText: Romelu Lukaku
indexImage.caption: Romelu Lukakuakionesha umahiri wake uwanjani

headlines.headline: Arjen Robben ku myaka 35 yasezeye gukina umupira

items.summary: Robben yanakiniye amakipe ya Real Madris na PSV, umupira yawutangiriye mu ikipe yo mu gihugu cye yitwa FC Groningen mu myaka 19 ishize.

indexImage.altText: Arjen Robben amakipe akomeye yakiniye yayatwayemo ibikombe
indexImage.caption: Arjen Robben amakipe akomeye yakiniye yayatwayemo ibikombe

headlines.headline: Frank Lampard, umutoza mushya wa Chelsea

items.summary: Lampard w'imyaka 41 y'amavuko, avuye mu ikipe ya Derby County yo mu cyiciro cyo hasi yari asanzwe atoza, ngo atoze Chelsea yakiniye imyaka 13.

indexImage.altText: Frank Lampard yasubiye mu ikipe yakiniye mu gihe cy'imyaka 13
indexImage.caption: Frank Lampard yasubiye mu ikipe yakiniye mu gihe cy'imyaka 13
